value: Hello there! How can I assist you today? If you have any questions or need help with something, feel free to ask. I'm here to help!
Hello! I'm your AI assistant for analyzing business data. You can ask me questions about your data, or request strategic analysis. How can I help you today?
Hello! I'm your AI assistant for analyzing business data. You can ask me questions about your data, or request strategic analysis. How can I help you today?

explain me below code "import os  from openai import OpenAI  from ..base import VannaBase    # from vanna.chromadb import ChromaDB_VectorStore  # class DeepSeekVanna(ChromaDB_VectorStore, DeepSeekChat): #     def __init__(self, config=None): #         ChromaDB_VectorStore.__init__(self, config=config) #         DeepSeekChat.__init__(self, config=config)  # vn = DeepSeekVanna(config={"api_key": "sk-************", "model": "deepseek-chat"})   class DeepSeekChat(VannaBase):     def __init__(self, config=None):         if config is None:             raise ValueError(                 "For DeepSeek, config must be provided with an api_key and model"             )         if "api_key" not in config:             raise ValueError("config must contain a DeepSeek api_key")          if "model" not in config:             raise ValueError("config must contain a DeepSeek model")              api_key = config["api_key"]         model = config["model"]         self.model = model         self.client = OpenAI(api_key=api_key, base_url="https://api.deepseek.com/v1")              def system_message(self, message: str) -> any:         return {"role": "system", "content": message}      def user_message(self, message: str) -> any:         return {"role": "user", "content": message}      def assistant_message(self, message: str) -> any:         return {"role": "assistant", "content": message}      def generate_sql(self, question: str, **kwargs) -> str:         # print(f"46 coming here")          # 使用父类的 generate_sql         sql = super().generate_sql(question, **kwargs)                  # 替换 "\_" 为 "_"         sql = sql.replace("\\_", "_")                  return sql      def submit_prompt(self, prompt, **kwargs) -> str:         chat_response = self.client.chat.completions.create(             model=self.model,             messages=prompt,         )                  return chat_response.choices[0].message.content"

sql: SELECT c.CustomerName FROM customers AS c JOIN employees AS e ON c.ManagerID = e.EmployeeID WHERE e.FirstName='Ajay' AND e.LastName='Menon'

value: write a email for customer Nisha Kapoor asking her about her experience with the product she purchased

Subject: Inquiry on Your Experience with Our Product

Dear Nisha Kapoor,

We hope this message finds you well. We are writing to inquire about your recent purchase from us.

As a valued customer, we appreciate your support and would love to hear your feedback regarding the product you have received. Your input is essential for us as it helps us understand how well our products meet your expectations and identify areas where we can improve further.

If you have any thoughts or comments on the product's performance, ease of use, features, or anything else related, please share them with us. We're always striving to provide an exceptional customer experience and would appreciate your honest feedback.

Please reply at your earliest convenience, so we can address any issues or concerns you may have and ensure that your experience with our products exceeds your expectations. If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. Our team is here to help!

Thank you for choosing us as your vendor. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Company Name]
[Contact Information]
which products nisha kapoor purchased.... give me all that information

I generated a SQL query but couldn't execute it. Error: Execution failed on sql 'SELECT oi.OrderID, p.ProductName, oi.Quantity FROM salesorders so
JOIN customers c ON so.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
JOIN employees e ON c.ManagerID = e.EmployeeID
JOIN orderitems oi ON so.OrderID = oi.OrderID
WHERE c.ContactPerson = 'Nisha Kapoor'': 1054 (42S22): Unknown column 'p.ProductName' in 'field list'
sql:
SELECT oi.OrderID, p.ProductName, oi.Quantity FROM salesorders so
JOIN customers c ON so.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
JOIN employees e ON c.ManagerID = e.EmployeeID
JOIN orderitems oi ON so.OrderID = oi.OrderID
WHERE c.ContactPerson = 'Nisha Kapoor'

value: which products Akshita Pandey purchased.... give me all that information

I generated a SQL query but couldn't execute it. Error: Execution failed on sql 'SELECT p.ProductName, oi.Quantity FROM products p JOIN orderitems oi ON p.ProductID = oi.ProductID WHERE c.CustomerName LIKE '%Pandey Akshita%' AND oi.OrderID IN (
    SELECT OrderID FROM salesorders so
    JOIN customers c ON so.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
    WHERE c.ContactPerson LIKE '%Akshita Pandey%'
)': 1054 (42S22): Unknown column 'c.CustomerName' in 'where clause'
sql:
SELECT p.ProductName, oi.Quantity FROM products p JOIN orderitems oi ON p.ProductID = oi.ProductID WHERE c.CustomerName LIKE '%Pandey Akshita%' AND oi.OrderID IN (
    SELECT OrderID FROM salesorders so
    JOIN customers c ON so.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
    WHERE c.ContactPerson LIKE '%Akshita Pandey%'
)
